latest news.eng_title: Northeast Region Boasts 18 Billionaires on Forbes 2024 List
latest news.summary: The 2024 Forbes list of the 240 billionaires in Brazil features 18 individuals from the Northeast region. The Ceará state stands out with 9 billionaires, including Mário Araripe, the richest man in the state and the North-Northeast region, with a fortune of nearly R$ 16 billion. Cândido Pinheiro Koren de Lima, the owner of the Hapvida health group, is the second richest person in the Northeast with a fortune of almost R$ 13.8 billion, a 150% increase from last year. Ilson Mateus Rodrigues, the founder of the Grupo Mateus retail group, remains the third richest person in the Northeast with a fortune of R$ 6.38 billion, a 11.4% decrease from last year. The states of Ceará and Maranhão have the highest number of billionaires, with 9 and 4 respectively. The total fortune of the 18 billionaires in the Northeast is R$ 67.3 billion.
latest news.title: Nordeste tem 18 bilionários na lista da Forbes em 2024; veja os nomes

latest news.eng_title: Nvidia CEO becomes the richest person by overtaking Mukesh Ambani
latest news.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has become the richest person, surpassing Mukesh Ambani with a net worth of $119 billion. Over the past five years, Huang's net worth has increased by 2280%, driven by the explosive growth of Nvidia, which is now the world's most valuable public company. Under Huang's leadership, Nvidia's market capitalisation has risen by 177% to $3.33 trillion, largely due to the company's dominance in the artificial intelligence sector. Huang plans to sell 600,000 shares of Nvidia, representing a small fraction of his 3% stake in the company. His remarkable progress underscores the profound impact of the AI revolution on his wealth.
latest news.title: Nvidia CEO becomes the richest person by overtaking Mukesh Ambani

latest news.eng_title: Waiter turned billionaire, CEO of one of world's most valuable companies now has net worth of Rs…
latest news.summary: Jensen Huang, the co-founder and CEO of Nvidia, has become one of the world's most successful tech entrepreneurs. Despite starting as a dishwasher and waiter at Denny's, Huang has now amassed a net worth of $112.1 billion, according to Forbes Real Time Billionaires List, making him the 13th richest person in the world. As reported by Forbes, Huang's salary in 2007 was $24.6 million, and Nvidia briefly became the world's most valuable publicly traded company, surpassing tech giants Microsoft and Apple. Huang's journey began in Taiwan, where he was born in 1963, and later moved to the United States to study at Stanford University. He co-founded Nvidia with Chris Malachowsky and Curtis Priem, and the company has since become a leader in AI computing, designing and supplying GPUs, APIs, and SoCs for various markets. As Huang's LinkedIn profile states, 'I started as a dishwasher, busboy, and waiter at Denny's.'
latest news.title: Waiter turned billionaire, CEO of one of world's most valuable companies now has net worth of Rs…

latest news.eng_title: Forbes Releases List of 9 Ceará Billionaires in 2024
latest news.summary: According to Forbes, there are 9 billionaires from the state of Ceará in 2024, down from 17 last year. The richest person in the state is Mário Araripe, an entrepreneur in the renewable energy sector, with a net worth of R$ 15.9 billion, a 14% increase from last year. This is also the highest net worth among all Northeasterners on the list of super-rich. Nationally, Araripe ranks 22nd, up from 23rd last year. Araripe is the founder of Casa dos Ventos, a Brazilian megacompany in renewable energy, and was also the founder of Troller, a brand of off-road vehicles sold to Ford for R$ 500 million and discontinued in 2021. The second richest person from Ceará is Candido Pinheiro Koren de Lima, with a net worth of R$ 13.7 billion, a 150% increase from last year's ranking. He is ranked 25th in the country. The third richest person from Ceará is Amarilio Proença de Macedo, with a net worth of R$ 3.98 billion.
latest news.title: Quem são os 9 bilionários do Ceará em 2024, segundo a Forbes

latest news.eng_title: Mark Cuban, Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, Michael Jordan, Rihanna: The Ages When 11 Famous Billionaires Reached The Milestone
latest news.summary: A recent list from Twitter account Andrew Lokenauth highlighted the ages it took some of the world's most prominent people to reach billionaire status. Mark Zuckerberg became a billionaire at 23, Bill Gates at 31, Tiger Woods at 33, Rihanna at 34, Jeff Bezos at 35, Mark Cuban at 40, Elon Musk at 41, Oprah Winfrey at 49, Jay-Z at 50, Michael Jordan at 51, and Warren Buffett at 56. The ages of billionaires around the world have a wide range, with some aged 19 and others in their 90s. The list includes the ages and wealth of some of the most famous billionaires, including Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, and Michael Jordan.
latest news.title: Mark Cuban, Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, Michael Jordan, Rihanna: The Ages When 11 Famous Billionaires Reached The Milestone

latest news.eng_title: Brazil's Youngest and Oldest Billionaires on the 2024 Forbes List
latest news.summary: Being a billionaire requires not only hard work and competence, but also time. The average age of Brazilian billionaires on the 2024 Forbes list is 62 years old. However, there are extremes. The youngest billionaire is Amelie Voigt Trejes, a Catarinense heir to the WEG company, which is a 'celeiro de bilionários' (a genuine breeding ground for billionaires) with 29 participants on the Forbes list this year. On the other hand, the oldest billionaire is João Jacob Vontobel, a Gaúcho from the Vonpar company.
latest news.title: Lista Forbes Bilionários Brasileiros 2024: a mais nova e o mais experiente

latest news.eng_title: Mukesh Ambani Jumps Back into Top 10 of World's Richest People List
latest news.summary: Mukesh Ambani has jumped back into the top 10 of the world's richest people list, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. His net worth increased by $72.9 million on Monday, taking him to $113 billion. He is now the 11th richest person in the world, just behind Sergey Brin, who has a net worth of $141 billion. Despite a decline in his net worth of $2.43 billion on Monday, Taiwanese entrepreneur Jensen Huang remains the richest person in the world, with a net worth of $111 billion. However, Ambani's net worth has increased by $17.1 billion this year, while Huang's net worth has increased by $66.8 billion. The top 10 richest people in the world include: 1. Jensen Huang ($111 billion), 2. Bernard Arnault ($201 billion), 3. Jeff Bezos ($199 billion), 4. Mark Zuckerberg ($185 billion), 5. Bill Gates ($160 billion), 6. Larry Ellison ($154 billion), 7. Larry Page ($150 billion), 8. Steve Ballmer ($144 billion), 9. Warren Buffett ($143 billion), 10. Sergey Brin ($141 billion). Ambani is currently ranked 11th, with a net worth of $113 billion.
latest news.title: मुकेश अंबानी ने रातोंरात पलट दी बाजी, अमीरों की लिस्ट में पहुंच गए टॉप 10 की दहलीज पर

latest news.eng_title: The Centibillionaires Club: 15 People Worth Over $100 Billion And Three More About To Join Their Ranks
latest news.summary: There are currently 15 centibillionaires worldwide, with a combined wealth of $2.3 trillion. These individuals have achieved this milestone through ownership of vast stock holdings in some of the world's most valuable companies. The top 15 centibillionaires include Elon Musk ($246 billion), Jeff Bezos ($203 billion), Bernard Arnault ($200 billion), Mark Zuckerberg ($190 billion), and Bill Gates ($160 billion). The Walton family, heirs to the Walmart fortune, are on the brink of joining the Centibillionaires Club, with net worths of $97.6 billion, $95.3 billion, and $94.7 billion, respectively. The number of centibillionaires is expected to grow significantly over the next decade.
latest news.title: The Centibillionaires Club: 15 People Worth Over $100 Billion And Three More About To Join Their Ranks

latest news.eng_title: Mukesh Ambani Slips To 12Th Place On 2024 World's Richest List; Find Out Who Overtook Him
latest news.summary: Mukesh Ambani, the Chairman of Reliance Industries and the richest person in India and Asia, has dropped to 12th place on the world's richest list. Jensen Huang, the founder and CEO of Nvidia, has surpassed Ambani to secure the 11th spot, with both having a net worth of $113 billion. However, Huang is ahead by a few dollars due to Nvidia's shares rising sharply this year, increasing his net worth by $69.3 billion. Mark Zuckerberg is ranked fourth on the world's richest list with a net worth of $188 billion, while Elon Musk holds the top spot with a net worth of $244 billion.
latest news.title: Mukesh Ambani Slips To 12Th Place On 2024 World's Richest List; Find Out Who Overtook Him

latest news.eng_title: NVIDIA's Jensen Huang Surpasses Mukesh Ambani in Wealth
latest news.summary: Jensen Huang, the CEO of NVIDIA, has seen a significant increase in his wealth, making him one of the richest people in the world. According to Forbes' real-time list of billionaires, he is currently ranked 11th with an estimated net worth of $77 billion. This is a remarkable increase from 2019 when he was estimated to be worth $5 billion. NVIDIA's market capitalization has increased by 177% to $3.33 trillion, making it one of the leading companies in the AI sector. Huang has been instrumental in NVIDIA's success, having founded the company in 1993 and serving as its CEO and President. He has also been instrumental in NVIDIA's expansion into AI, data centers, and self-driving cars. Huang plans to sell 600,000 NVIDIA shares by March 2025, which is a small portion of his total 3% stake in the company. Despite this, his net worth is expected to continue to grow as NVIDIA's market capitalization continues to increase.
latest news.title: वो एशियाई जिसने सबसे अमीर लोगों की सूची में मुकेश अंबानी को छोड़ा पीछे, गौतम अडानी या रतन टाटा नहीं!

news knowledge.eng_title: Billionaires Who Have Lost Wealth in 2024
news knowledge.summary: Among the 14 billionaires with a net worth of over $10 billion, 13 have increased their wealth since the beginning of the year. The largest increase was seen in Jensen Huang, the founder of Nvidia, whose net worth grew by $64 billion to $108 billion. Mark Zuckerberg also saw a significant increase, with his net worth rising by $63 billion to $191 billion, placing him third in the Bloomberg rich list behind Elon Musk ($239 billion) and Jeff Bezos ($201 billion).
news knowledge.title: Milliardäre, die heuer ärmer geworden sind

news knowledge.eng_title: Jensen Huang's Wealth Surges to $102.8 Billion After Nvidia Stock Soars
news knowledge.summary: Jensen Huang, the CEO of Nvidia, added approximately $12 billion to his wealth on Wednesday, a record-breaking increase that matches the strong performance of the chipmaker's stock. Nvidia's stock rose 12.8% on Wednesday, as part of a strong day for global semiconductor stocks, before its gains were reduced and it fell 3.70% to $112.70 at 7:20 PM Makkah time. This increase in Huang's wealth was the largest single-day gain in dollar terms for the co-founder of Nvidia, surpassing the $9.6 billion he gained on February 22 when the company's stock rose after reporting strong earnings. According to Bloomberg's billionaire index, this also pushed Huang's net worth above $100 billion for the first time in a week, reaching $102.8 billion. Huang, 61, is now ranked 14th on the list of the world's richest people, having consistently benefited from Nvidia's strong stock performance, and has sold part of his stake, including a 169 million dollar share in June.
news knowledge.title: جينسن هوانج يحقق أكبر زيادة في ثروته بإضافة 12 مليار دولار خلال يوم

news knowledge.eng_title: Nvidia CEO's Wealth Surges to $101 Billion
news knowledge.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang saw his wealth increase by $10.3 billion on July 31, equivalent to $58.2 billion in Brazilian reais. This growth has placed Huang in the 14th position on the Forbes real-time billionaire ranking, with a total wealth of $101.3 billion ($572.3 billion in reais). This increase in Huang's wealth is due to a new valuation of Nvidia's shares on the Nasdaq stock exchange, which rose around 10% after Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) reported positive financial results. AMD also saw a 10% increase after revising its sales forecast for artificial intelligence chips in 2024, estimating a revenue of $6.7 billion in the third quarter, $300 million above market expectations, representing an annual growth of around 16%. According to Sam Stovall, chief investment strategist at CFRA Research, AMD's results impressed investors more than the disappointment caused by Microsoft, leading to an increase in positions in the semiconductor sector. As a crucial supplier for the expansion of artificial intelligence, Nvidia saw Huang's wealth more than quintuple in recent months. In 2023, Huang ended the year with an estimated wealth of $21.1 billion, just one-fifth of the current amount. In 2017, his wealth was $2.7 billion, equivalent to only 2% of the current value.
news knowledge.title: CEO da Nvidia ganha US$ 10 bilhões em um dia; fortuna passa de US$ 101 bilhões

news knowledge.eng_title: Ultra-rich men's worth this 2024: Musk, Bezos, Arnault, Ambani, Zuckerberg, Gates, Ellison, Page, Brin, Buffett, Balmer, Ortega, Huang, Bloomberg, Dell
news knowledge.summary: The article lists the top 15 ultra-rich individuals with net worths exceeding $100 billion, as per Forbes and CEO World, as of 2024. The list includes Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, Bernard Arnault, Larry Ellison, Mark Zuckerberg, Larry Page, Sergey Brin, Warren Buffett, Bill Gates, Mukesh Ambani, Amancio Ortega, Jensen Huang, Michael Bloomberg, and Michael Dell. These individuals have amassed wealth through their dominance in key industries, including technology, luxury goods, and investments, and share common traits such as tech dominance, entrepreneurial ventures, diversification, and huge shares in companies with a global impact.
news knowledge.title: Ultra-rich men's worth this 2024: Musk, Bezos, Arnault, Ambani, Zuckerberg, Gates, Ellison, Page, Brin, Buffett, Balmer, Ortega, Huang, Bloomberg, Dell

news knowledge.eng_title: Jensen Huang Net Worth 2024: How Much Money Does He Make?
news knowledge.summary: Jensen Huang, the CEO and president of Nvidia, has an estimated net worth of $119 billion in 2024. His net worth increased by over $4 billion after Nvidia became the world's most valuable public company, driven by artificial intelligence. Huang's net worth is primarily composed of his 3% ownership in Nvidia and his CEO salary. He has also decided to sell 600,000 shares of the company by March 2025. Huang's leadership style is influenced by his humble beginnings, having started as a busboy at a Denny's restaurant and later co-founding Nvidia in 1993. He is currently the 11th richest person in the world, according to Forbes's real-time billionaire list.
news knowledge.title: Jensen Huang Net Worth 2024: How Much Money Does He Make?

news knowledge.eng_title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang cashes in on stock rally with $229 million share sale
news knowledge.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang sold nearly $169 million worth of shares in June, the most he has ever made in a single month, due to the company's stock surge. This has increased his net worth to $107.7 billion, making him the 13th richest person on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. Huang's net worth has more than doubled in the past six months, from $44 billion to $107.7 billion, due to the company's 150% gain since the start of 2024.
news knowledge.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang cashes in on stock rally with $229 million share sale

news knowledge.eng_title: The 10 Billionaires Who Lost the Most Money in the First Half of 2024
news knowledge.summary: The first half of 2024 saw significant changes in the fortunes of the world's richest individuals. Elon Musk, CEO of Tesla, suffered the largest loss, with his net worth decreasing by $30 billion due to the cancellation of his $51 billion compensation package and the decline in Tesla's stock value. Despite this, he remains the world's richest person. Other notable losers include Bernard Arnault, whose net worth decreased by $6.9 billion, and Carlos Slim Helu, whose net worth decreased by $18.9 billion. On the other hand, Jensen Huang, CEO of Nvidia, saw his net worth increase by $64.1 billion, driven by the AI boom, and Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of Meta, saw his net worth increase by $61.5 billion. Other notable gainers include Michael Dell, Larry Ellison, and Larry Page.
news knowledge.title: Estes são os 10 bilionários que mais perderam dinheiro no 1° semestre de 2024

news knowledge.eng_title: Jensen Huang cashes in on Nvidia's rally with US$169 million share sale
news knowledge.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang sold 1.3 million shares worth nearly US$169 million in June, his largest single-month sale, as the company's stock surged due to high demand for AI chips. This sale, executed under a 10b5-1 trading plan, brought Huang's net worth to US$63.7 billion, making him the 13th richest person on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. Huang's foundation, the Jen-Hsun & Lori Huang Foundation, holds an estimated US$8 billion in shares, with most of Huang's personal giving going to a donor-advised fund. Since 2020, Huang has cashed out nearly US$1.1 billion in shares, with plans to continue selling in July.
news knowledge.title: Jensen Huang cashes in on Nvidia's rally with US$169 million share sale

news knowledge.eng_title: Huang Cashes In on Nvidia's Rally With $169 Million Share Sale
news knowledge.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang sold 1.3 million shares worth nearly $169 million in June, his largest single-month sale. The sale came during a month when Nvidia's market value rose above $3 trillion, making it the world's most valuable company. Huang's net worth has more than doubled to $107.7 billion, making him the 13th richest person on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. Other Nvidia executives and directors have also sold shares, totaling over $700 million in the first half of the year. Huang's personal foundation, the Jen-Hsun & Lori Huang Foundation, holds an estimated $8 billion in Nvidia shares and has given most of its donations to a donor-advised fund. Huang has sold nearly $1.1 billion in shares since 2020 and plans to continue selling in July.
news knowledge.title: Huang Cashes In on Nvidia's Rally With $169 Million Share Sale

news knowledge.eng_title: From Cleaning Bathrooms to Becoming a Billionaire: Jensen Huang's Inspiring Journey
news knowledge.summary: Jensen Huang, co-founder of Nvidia, has risen from humble beginnings to become one of the most powerful and admired CEOs in the world. With a personal fortune of over $77 billion, Huang's success is a testament to perseverance, innovation, and bold vision in the field of artificial intelligence. Huang, ranked as the 20th richest person in the world by Forbes, has seen the value of Nvidia's stock soar, with a 70% increase this year and a 1749% return over the past five years. He co-founded Nvidia in 1993 and has implemented a flat organizational structure, reflecting his humble beginnings. Huang has also shared his unique approach to problem-solving and leadership, emphasizing the importance of character and resilience. Elon Musk, CEO of Tesla and owner of X, has praised Huang's mindset, saying 'That's absolutely the right attitude.' Huang's story is an inspiration to many, and his leadership has made him a influential figure not only in the tech industry but also in the global economy.
news knowledge.title: Solía limpiar baños en EE.UU. y ahora es uno de los CEO más poderosos del mundo: hasta Elon Musk lo admira
